title: When I Saved a Cute High School Girl Working Part Time at a Convenience Store, She Started Sending Gifts to My House for Some Reason - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Takanashi Ponta   たかなしポン太
description:
At the cash register of the convenience store, I saved a really cute employee from a blond haired yankee. I didn’t know that I had already saved her once near Kichijouji station. This coincidence was really interesting.

Minamino Asuka-chan.

Now that I look at her again, she really was a beautiful high-schooler. 

I really believe this is fate! Since he saved me not just once, but twice.

Nakadai Eita-san.

I wasn’t able to stop the ends of my mouth from loosening.

The scene is Tokyo.

This is a lighthearted, coming of age story which unravels when a group of university students from the countryside and some young girls from Tokyo meet.>
